text: That's my ideal day, time with my boys.
author: Kenny G

text: Mom and Dad would stay in bed on Sunday morning, but the kids would have to go to church.
author: Lynn Johnston

text: We criticize mothers for closeness. We criticize fathers for distance. How many of us have expected less from our fathers and appreciated what they gave us more? How many of us always let them off the hook?
author: Ellen Goodman

text: Home life's great, man. The kids are great, happy and healthy. I've reached this sort of wonderful precipice.
author: Ryan Phillippe

text: My mother was the influence in my life. She was strong she had great faith in the ultimate triumph of justice and hard work. She believed passionately in education.
author: John H. Johnson
